Summary: Biochemical reaction from buprenorphine to norbuprenorphine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C8, CYP3A4, CYP3A7 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from buprenorphine to buprenorphine 3-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT1A1 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from norbuprenorphine to norbuprenorphine glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A1 or UGT1A3.
